Class ScoringDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • kmu.itsp.score.core.dao.CommonDAOImpl
      • kmu.itsp.score.scoring.ScoringDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommonDAO, ScoringDAO

    @Repository
public class ScoringDAOImpl
extends CommonDAOImpl
implements ScoringDAO
    채점에 대한 정보가 담긴 DB에 access하는 Repository 클래스

    WJ
